text: i jnanam niku andina tarvata kuda evadaina nito atanini (isanu) gurinci vivadaniki digite, ila anu: "Randi! Memu mariyu miru kalisi, ma kumarulanu mariyu mi kumarulanu; ma strilanu mariyu mi strilanu pilucukoni, andaramu kalisi: 'Asatyam palike varipai allah sapam (bahiskaram) padugaka!' Ani hrdayapurvakanga prarthiddamu
